sourceMeaningMnemonic: Inside that <radical>building</radical> someone is doing a <radical>rice</radical> <radical>dance</radical>. That someone is your <kanji>neighbor</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine your neighbor doing a rice dance, whatever that may be, in the building next to yours. That's your neighbor, for ya.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>neighbor</kanji> has an incredible <reading>rin</reading>g (<ja>りん</ja>) that they use for their rice dance.
readingInfo: Imagine the ring your neighbor has as overly extravagant. You have to make it wild enough for you to remember. Maybe it is integral to their rice dance. Perhaps you covet your neighbor's rice dance ring.
